name: Gun Golf Game
description:
The Gun Golf Game is a small puzzle-platformer in which you are a golf ball, with a six shot revolver. You have six "strokes" and you must use the recoil of the gun in order to propel yourself into the goal.

     This game was a small game project made in C# / MonoGame made by Cooper Knapp, Brian Kiss, Allen Briggs, and Paul Crumrine
